alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 10 at 1:22PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Buchanan, Benton and northwestern Linn Counties through 145 PM CST... At 122 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Fairbank to near Keystone. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fairbank around 125 PM CST. Hazleton around 130 PM CST. Garrison around 135 PM CST. Stanley around 140 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Vinton and Shellsburg. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 33 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
